Dear ~EasyUser.getDisplayName~,

This E-mail concerns the following dataset you deposited with DANS:
Title: ~Dataset.getPreferredTitle~
Link: https://doi.org/~Dataset.getDansManagedDoi~

The dataset is now available to the public in accordance with the conditions indicated by you. If you want to apply changes, e.g. in the metadata, please contact us.
If applicable you will find a newly generated Licence agreement attached, which replaces the previous one.
